text:
Hi all, I am so glad to have found this community.

I am an email copywriter and email marketing strategist.  I write nurture sequences, sales sequences (both direct response and story based), will set up the sequences, help map your opt in to your offer(s).  I also can work on retainer so can take over list management.  This is best for businesses that do most of their sales via email.

I also help companies start and build an email list or those that have an email list but are not communicating and building relations with subscribers.

I have two spots available in May.
